reviews.text:
Found this clinic next to the hawker. Quite convenient to go to, barely 5mins away from the MRT.

The clinic has just renovated and it seems quite nice but thankfully the prices are still reasonable in my opinion.

They have Blood tests, Xray and Ultrasound services. Makes it very convenient for helper to come and get her 6ME.

Dr Kong is quite approachable and doesn't hard sell her products. And she is also knowledgeable too.
The staff very friendly and support as soon as possible. Fast Medical checkup, highly recommended üëç

Friendly and patient clinical staff. Dr Faizal is very experienced, knowledgeable and patient. Explains in great details and is very approachable and helpful.

Good medical clinic at affordable price. Highly recommended.

The worst front desk staff.  Told me to back to take the report 3-4 days later due to Dr is on leave, she even said when the report ready will give a call, but did not mention the delay of taking report may have a change of 10 dollars delay fee.  I texted official whatsapp 1 week later due to not receiving phone call, the next day when I go take the report, the same front desk staff told me have to pay 10 dollars.  She argued with me she surely told me.  I said I would pay if you told but you not even mentioned.  In the end I guess she found she was wrong because I didn‚Äôt sign on the agreement.  She kept murmuring ‚Äúok ok forget about ‚Äú. The attitude is very annoying.

Kudos to the team. Friendly reception and the doctor was very professional as he well explained and detailed in the findings. Will definitely return here for our family's checkup moving forward. Much appreciated.
